content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Copper Plate Mine at position(-46.0, 71.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position: -46.0, 71.0)
- Stone furnace (position: -45.0, 73.0)
- Burner inserter (position: -44.5, 71.5)

#### Iron Plate Mine at position(16.0, 71.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position: 16.0, 71.0)
- Stone furnace (position: 17.0, 73.0)
- Burner inserter (position: 17.5, 71.5)

### ERROR TIPS

#### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
- Ensure there are items to insert into the furnace before attempting to insert.

#### Errors when placing entities next to another entity
- Ensure there are no collisions with existing entities or the area is not water before placing.
- Consider increasing the spacing, changing the direction, or changing the reference position.

### NAMESPACE

#### Important Variables
- `copper_drill`: Burner mining drill entity at position(-46.0, 71.0)
- `iron_drill`: Burner mining drill entity at position(16.0, 71.0)
- `copper_furnace`: Stone furnace entity at position(-45.0, 73.0)
- `iron_furnace`: Stone furnace entity at position(17.0, 73.0)
- `copper_inserter`: Burner inserter entity at position(-44.5, 71.5)
- `iron_inserter`: Burner inserter entity at position(17.5, 71.5)

No utility functions have been defined by the agent in the given logs.
